description: This header defines the 'Response' class within the 'WebSockets::JsonRpc' namespace, representing a JSON-RPC response message for WebSocket communication. It declares constructors, destructor, and methods for accessing response properties like ID, result, error, and validity, and deletes copy constructors to prevent copying.

classes.name: Response
classes.description: A class representing a JSON-RPC response message, providing interface methods to retrieve response details such as ID, result, error, and validity status.

methods.name: Response
methods.description: Default constructor for the Response class.

methods.name: ~Response
methods.description: Default destructor for the Response class.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID associated with this response message.

methods.name: isResult
methods.description: Indicates whether the response contains a valid result.

methods.name: getResult
methods.description: Retrieves the result object if present; returns true if successful.

methods.name: isError
methods.description: Indicates whether the response contains an error.

methods.name: getError
methods.description: Retrieves the error object if present; returns true if successful.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Checks whether the response message is valid.
